Description: Please READ entire ad, see pics for condition, and ask ALL questions BEFORE purchase! Thanks! Up for sale here is a 2017 Epiphone Sheraton II Pro guitar with a classic "Wine Red" finish. It features a hand-set 5-piece laminated hard maple/walnut 24.75" scale neck, rosewood fingerboard with block and triangle pearloid and abalone inlays, 22 medium-jumbo frets, large vintage-style "tree of life" motif "Clipped Ear" headstock and a ProBucker-3 humbucker pickup in the bridge and a ProBucker-2 humbucker pickup in the neck, each with individual volume and tone controls with coil taps in each volume pot. My guitar is in excellent shape with no notable signs of wear; just a few light surface scratches. No case. Please don't hesitate to ask any and all questions that you may have or for more pictures BEFORE you buy and I will get back to you immediately.
